column3:
古代の祠の周りに
たくさんの花を植えたオコバ

花を傷つけないよう
気を付けて進もう
column4:
Magda planted flowers all around the
ancient shrine.

Proceed with care so youdon't damage the
flowers.

column3:
花を踏まずに古代の祠へ
到達することができた

オコバの逆鱗に触れずに済んだ
column4:
You reached the shrine amidst the flowers
that Magda had planted.

Try not to step on any flowers from here on out!
